title: Fold Lines
subTitle: Fold lines are vertical lines that indicate where the folder should be folded. They are usually dotted and magenta but can vary.

options.action: Automatic: Open the DTP Tab in Presta & check 'AutoCheck Artwork' box. Manual: Open the DTP Tab in Presta, check 'Attachments' box, and see agent name under 'Uploaded by'.

solution.title: Fold Lines
solution.action:
Request a new file from Prepress
File complaint in Presta

summaries.title: Solution
summaries.description: Our artwork team added folding lines unnecessarily to the cPDF, which caused it to be printed.

summaries.title: What to tell the customer
summaries.description: Our artwork team added folding lines unnecessarily to the print file, which caused it to be printed incorrectly. To resolve this, we can offer you a discount on the current order, arrange a reprint with an altered file that we will provide, or issue a refund if a reprint is no longer feasible. Please let us know which option you prefer, and we will take the necessary steps to ensure your satisfaction.

summaries.title: Log in Presta
summaries.description: Complaint Department: Manual Artwork Check Complaint Type: Processed Incorrectly

To resolve this, we can offer you a discount on the current order, arrange a reprint with an altered file that we will provide, or issue a refund if a reprint is no longer feasible. Please let us know which option you prefer, and we will take the necessary steps to ensure your satisfaction.

summaries.title: Solution
summaries.description: Send a side conversation to Artwork_Complaints inbox with the artwork complaints macro.

question.text: Fold lines on print layer in template?

solution.title: Fold Lines
solution.action:
Use same file for reprint
File complaint in Presta

questions.title: Fold lines on print layer in template?

summaries.title: Solution
summaries.description: The cPDF sent to the supplier is correct, however folding lines were added during their process and printed incorrectly. We can reprint with the same file.

summaries.title: What to tell the customer
summaries.description: We’ve identified that an error occurred during our processing, resulting in an incorrect print due to added folding lines. To resolve this, we can offer you a discount on the current order, arrange a reprint with an altered file that we will provide, or issue a refund if a reprint is no longer feasible. Please let us know which option you prefer, and we will take the necessary steps to ensure your satisfaction.

summaries.title: Log in Presta
summaries.description: Complaint Department: Supplier Complaint Type: Printed Incorrectly

solution.title: Fold Lines
solution.action:
Create a fixed cPDF for reprint
Inform Quinten/Rafael/Miguel of template issue
File complaint in Presta

summaries.title: Solution

summaries.title: What to tell the customer
summaries.description: We’ve identified that an error occurred during our processing, resulting in an incorrect print due to added folding lines. To resolve this, we can offer you a discount on the current order, arrange a reprint with an altered file that we will provide, or issue a refund if a reprint is no longer feasible. solution.title: Fold Lines
solution.action:
Request a new file from customer
File complaint in Presta

summaries.title: Solution
summaries.description: The customer added pixelated folding lines on a flat file, because of inattention during the artwork check process it was left in the cPDF and printed as part of the design.

summaries.title: What to tell the customer
summaries.description: We’ve identified that pixelated folding lines added by you were not caught during our artwork check process, resulting in those being printed as part of the design. To resolve this, we can offer you a discount on the current order, arrange a reprint once you provide a corrected file, or issue a refund if a reprint is no longer feasible. Please let us know which option you prefer and provide the new file if you choose the reprint option. We will take the necessary steps to ensure your satisfaction.

summaries.title: Log in Presta
summaries.description: Complaint Department: Manual Artwork Check Complaint Type: Processed Incorrectly

question.text: What type of order is this?

summaries.title: Solution
summaries.description: We need to review these case by case. Take into account such factors as: Priority Client, amount of orders total, amount of prior complaints, amount spent total, purchase price vs. customer price.

options.text: Purchase price is under 150 or New CMR

solution.title: Fold Lines
solution.action:
Request a new file from the customer
File complaint in Presta

questions.title: Purchase price is under 150 or New CMR

summaries.title: Solution
summaries.description: The customer added a pixelated folding line on a flat file, as pixels are not recognised as fold lines by autocheck this was not caught and it was processed as part of the design.

summaries.title: What to tell the customer (NEW)
summaries.description: As a special consideration for being a new customer, we understand that you may not have been fully aware of our processes. As an exception, we would like to offer you a free reprint of your order. However, we kindly request that you provide us with a new design that does not include pixelated folding lines, as these are not recognized as fold lines by our system and are processed as part of the design. This gesture is intended to ensure your satisfaction and demonstrate our commitment to delivering the best possible product.

summaries.title: What to tell the customer (RETURNING)
summaries.description: As a returning customer, we appreciate your continued support and understand that you may not have been fully aware that pixelated folding lines are not recognized by our autocheck system and are processed as part of the design. To ensure your satisfaction and as a gesture of goodwill, we are offering you a 10% discount on the current order or as a voucher for your next order. Please provide us with a new design that does not include the pixelated folding line to avoid any further issues.

summaries.title: Log in Presta
summaries.description: Complaint Department: Customer goodwill Complaint Type: Wrong artwork uploaded
